description:
They found themselves in Tahiti, deep in the jungle with barely an inkling of where they might be or where they should go. Perfectly lost on a long run with only the essentials and a few friends. This capsule is a joint adventure, born of misadventure and the good things found when not in search of them.

Run Amok’s layered short. Made with a lightweight, microperforated 4-way stretch fabric. An exposed, integrated breathable compression liner features a phone ready pocket. The shell maintains Run Amok’s attention to detail with two magnetic close slash pockets, back zip pockets and enhanced ventilation. Created with intention for everyday athletic use.

Best Used For: Training, Running
name: Roark Ciele X Run Amok - Bommer Shorts, 3.5" Inseam - Mens
